001package edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.viewmodel;
002
003import android.annotation.SuppressLint;
004import android.util.Log;
005import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
006import androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData;
007import androidx.lifecycle.Transformations;
008import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModel;
009import dagger.hilt.android.lifecycle.HiltViewModel;
010import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.model.entity.Apod;
011import edu.cnm.deepdive.spaceseek.service.ApodRepository;
012import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.CompositeDisposable;
013import java.time.LocalDate;
014import java.time.YearMonth;
015import java.util.List;
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.function.Function;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import javax.inject.Inject;
020
021@HiltViewModel
022public class ApodViewModel extends ViewModel {
023
024  private static final String TAG = ApodViewModel.class.getSimpleName();
025
026  private final ApodRepository repository;
027  private final MutableLiveData<YearMonth> yearMonth;
028  private final LiveData<List<Apod>> apods;
029  private final MutableLiveData<Long> apodId;
030  private final MutableLiveData<Apod> randomApod;
031  private final MutableLiveData<Throwable> throwable;
032  private final CompositeDisposable pending;
033
034
035  @Inject
036  ApodViewModel(ApodRepository repository) {
037    this.repository = repository;
038    yearMonth = new MutableLiveData<>(YearMonth.now());
039    apodId = new MutableLiveData<>();
040    randomApod = new MutableLiveData<>();
041    throwable = new MutableLiveData<>();
042    apods = Transformations.switchMap(Transformations.distinctUntilChanged(yearMonth),
043        this::transformYearMonthToQuery);
044    pending = new CompositeDisposable();
045  }
046
047  /**
048   * Retrieves the list of APODs for the currently selected YearMonth.
049   *
050   * @return LiveData containing the list of APODs for the selected range.
051   */
052  public LiveData<List<Apod>> getApods() {
053    return apods;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Retrieves the details of an individual APOD by ID.
058   *
059   * @return LiveData containing the individual APOD details.
060   */
061  public LiveData<Apod> getApod() {
062    return Transformations
063        .switchMap(Transformations
064            .distinctUntilChanged(apodId), repository::get);
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Sets the ID of the APOD for which details are requested.
069   *
070   * @param apodId The unique identifier of the APOD.
071   */
072  public void setApodId(long apodId) {
073    this.apodId.setValue(apodId);
074  }
075
076  public LiveData<Apod> getRandomApod() {
077    return randomApod;
078  }
079
080  /**
081   * Retrieves a map of APODs keyed by their LocalDate.
082   *
083   * @return LiveData containing a map of APODs.
084   */
085  public LiveData<Map<LocalDate, Apod>> getApodMap() {
086    return Transformations.map(apods, (apodList) -> apodList
087        .stream()
088        .collect(Collectors.toMap(Apod::getDate, Function.identity())));
089  }
090
091  /**
092   * Retrieves the currently selected YearMonth for filtering APODs.
093   *
094   * @return LiveData containing the selected YearMonth.
095   */
096  public LiveData<YearMonth> getYearMonth() {
097    return yearMonth;
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * Sets the currently selected YearMonth for filtering APODs.
102   *
103   * @param yearMonth The YearMonth to set.
104   */
105  public void setYearMonth(YearMonth yearMonth) {
106    this.yearMonth.setValue(yearMonth);
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Retrieves the list of favorite APODs.
111   *
112   * @return LiveData containing the list of favorite APODs.
113   */
114  public LiveData<List<Apod>> getFavorites() {
115    // Fetch favorites from repository and return LiveData<List<Apod>>.
116    return repository.getFavorites();
117  }
118
119  /**
120   * Fetches APODs for the user's birthdate across all years.
121   *
122   * @param dob The user's date of birth (formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD").
123   */
124  @SuppressLint("CheckResult")
125  public void fetchApodsForDateAcrossYears(String dob) {
126    try {
127      LocalDate birthDate = LocalDate.parse(dob); // Parse user's DOB.
128      repository.fetchApodsForDateAcrossYears(birthDate)
129          .subscribe(
130              () -> Log.d(TAG, "Personalized APODs fetched successfully."),
131              this::postThrowable,
132              pending
133          );
134    } catch (Exception e) {
135      Log.e(TAG, "Invalid DOB format: " + dob, e);
136    }
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Fetches APODs for a specific date range.
141   *
142   * @param yearMonth The YearMonth for filtering APODs.
143   * @return LiveData containing the list of APODs.
144   */
145  private LiveData<List<Apod>> transformYearMonthToQuery(YearMonth yearMonth) {
146    LocalDate startDate = yearMonth.minusMonths(1).atDay(1);
147    LocalDate endDate = yearMonth.plusMonths(2).atDay(1);
148    throwable.setValue(null);
149    repository
150        .fetch(startDate, endDate)
151        .subscribe(
152            () -> {
153            },
154            this::postThrowable,
155            pending
156        );
157    return repository.get(startDate, endDate);
158  }
159
160  /**
161   * Handles errors and logs them appropriately.
162   *
163   * @param throwable The error encountered during data fetching.
164   */
165  private void postThrowable(Throwable throwable) {
166    Log.e(TAG, throwable.getMessage(), throwable);
167    this.throwable.postValue(throwable);
168  }
169
170  /**
171   * Fetches a random number of APODs.
172   */
173  public void fetchRandomApod() {
174    repository.fetchRandomApod()
175        .subscribe(
176            apodId::postValue,
177            this::postThrowable,
178            pending
179        );
180  }
181}
